purpose: To provide a comprehensive observability platform that enhances monitoring and troubleshooting capabilities in cloud-native environments.
principle: Integrates OpenTelemetry for telemetry data collection and eBPF for kernel-level insights, using LLM for automated analysis and troubleshooting.
reusability: Offers integration with existing observability tools via OpenTelemetry, supports plugin architecture for custom extensions.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for non-standard environments, requires expertise in observability tools for effective use.
